databaseConfig.sql: SELECT MS_SHOUSHO.MS_SHOUSHO_ID, MS_SHOUSHO.MS_SHOUSHO_NAME, MS_SHOUSHO.KANKAKU, MS_SHOUSHO.DELETE_FLAG, MS_SHOUSHO.SEND_FLAG, MS_SHOUSHO.VESSEL_ID, MS_SHOUSHO.DATA_NO, MS_SHOUSHO.USER_KEY, MS_SHOUSHO.RENEW_DATE, MS_SHOUSHO.RENEW_USER_ID, MS_SHOUSHO.TS FROM MS_SHOUSHO where MS_SHOUSHO.DELETE_FLAG = 0

SELECT MS_SHOUSHO.MS_SHOUSHO_ID, MS_SHOUSHO.MS_SHOUSHO_NAME, MS_SHOUSHO.KANKAKU, MS_SHOUSHO.DELETE_FLAG, MS_SHOUSHO.SEND_FLAG, MS_SHOUSHO.VESSEL_ID, MS_SHOUSHO.DATA_NO, MS_SHOUSHO.USER_KEY, MS_SHOUSHO.RENEW_DATE, MS_SHOUSHO.RENEW_USER_ID, MS_SHOUSHO.TS FROM MS_SHOUSHO WHERE MS_SHOUSHO.MS_SHOUSHO_ID = :MS_SHOUSHO_ID

INSERT INTO MS_SHOUSHO( MS_SHOUSHO_ID, MS_SHOUSHO_NAME, KANKAKU, DELETE_FLAG, SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID, DATA_NO, USER_KEY, RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID, TS ) VALUES ( :MS_SHOUSHO_ID, :MS_SHOUSHO_NAME, :KANKAKU, :DELETE_FLAG, :SEND_FLAG, :VESSEL_ID, :DATA_NO, :USER_KEY, :RENEW_DATE, :RENEW_USER_ID, :TS )

UPDATE MS_SHOUSHO SET MS_SHOUSHO_NAME = :MS_SHOUSHO_NAME, KANKAKU = :KANKAKU, DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG, SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID, DATA_NO = :DATA_NO, USER_KEY = :USER_KEY, RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID WHERE (MS_SHOUSHO_ID = :MS_SHOUSHO_ID) AND (TS = :TS)
